00020 
00021 #ifndef _TDUMP2_H
00022 #define _TDUMP2_H
00023 
00024 #include <cstdlib>
00025 #include <votca/ctp/qmcalculator.h>
00026 
00027 
00028 namespace votca { namespace ctp {
00029 
00030 
00031 
00032 
00033 class TDump : public QMCalculator
00034 {
00035 
00036 public:
00037 
00038     TDump() : _outPDBmd("MD.pdb"), _outPDBqm("QM.pdb"), 
00039               _framesToWrite(1),   _framesWritten(0)     { };
00040    ~TDump() { };
00041 
00042     string Identify() { return "Trajectory dump"; }
00043 
00044     void Initialize(Topology *top, Property *options);
00045     bool EvaluateFrame(Topology *top);
00046 
00047 private:
00048 
00049     string _outPDBmd;
00050     string _outPDBqm;
00051 
00052     int    _framesWritten;
00053     int    _framesToWrite;
00054 
00055     
00056 };
00057 
00058 
00059 void TDump::Initialize(Topology *top, Property *options) {
00060 
00061     string key = "options.tdump";
00062 
00063     if (options->exists(key+".md") && options->exists(key+".qm")) {
00064         _outPDBmd = options->get(key+".md").as<string>();
00065         _outPDBqm = options->get(key+".qm").as<string>();
00066     }
00067 
00068     if (options->exists(key+".frames")) {
00069         _framesToWrite = options->get(key+".frames").as<int>();
00070     }
00071 
00072 }
00073 
00074 bool TDump::EvaluateFrame(Topology *top) {
00075 
00076     if (_framesWritten > _framesToWrite) { return 1; }
00077 
00078     // Rigidify system (if possible)
00079     bool isRigid = top->Rigidify();
00080     if (!isRigid) {
00081         return 0;
00082     }
00083 
00084     // Print coordinates
00085     FILE *outPDBmd = NULL;
00086     FILE *outPDBqm = NULL;
00087 
00088     outPDBmd = fopen(_outPDBmd.c_str(), "a");
00089     outPDBqm = fopen(_outPDBqm.c_str(), "a");
00090 
00091     fprintf(outPDBmd, "TITLE     VOT CAtastrophic title \n");
00092     fprintf(outPDBmd, "Model %8d \n" , _framesWritten);
00093 
00094     fprintf(outPDBqm, "TITLE     VOT CAtastrophic title \n");
00095     fprintf(outPDBqm, "Model %8d \n", _framesWritten);    
00096 
00097     vector< Segment* > ::iterator sit;
00098     for (sit = top->Segments().begin();
00099          sit < top->Segments().end();
00100          sit++) {
00101 
00102         (*sit)->WritePDB(outPDBmd, "Atoms", "MD");
00103         (*sit)->WritePDB(outPDBqm, "Atoms", "QM");
00104     }
00105 
00106     fprintf(outPDBmd, "TER\nENDMDL\n");
00107     fprintf(outPDBqm, "TER\nENDMDL\n");
00108 
00109     fclose(outPDBmd);
00110     fclose(outPDBqm);
00111 
00112     _framesWritten++;
00113 }
00114 
00115 }}
00116 
00117 
00118 #endif
